content.heroIntro: Welcome to THE REFERENCE, an exceptional new development by RIVESTURISMO in the heart of Centro Torrevieja. This carefully curated collection of modern apartments and penthouses represents the pinnacle of contemporary coastal living on Spain's Costa Blanca. With units starting from just €183,900, THE REFERENCE offers an unbeatable opportunity to own property in one of Europe's most sought-after expat destinations. Each residence features premium finishes, thoughtful design, and access to world-class amenities including pristine beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Scheduled for delivery on 01-07-2028, RIVESTURISMO has established themselves as a trusted developer delivering quality homes that combine functionality with style. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday home, or investment property with strong rental potential, THE REFERENCE positions you perfectly within Torrevieja's vibrant community where English is widely spoken and expatriate life thrives.

locationSection.intro: THE REFERENCE enjoys a prime position in Centro Torrevieja, placing you at the epicenter of this dynamic Costa Blanca destination. Centro offers the perfect blend of Mediterranean charm and modern convenience, with tree-lined streets, local Spanish character, and seamless access to international amenities. This neighborhood is beloved by the region's largest expatriate community in Spain, where English is spoken everywhere and international services are abundant. You'll appreciate the walkable streets, authentic dining venues, contemporary shopping facilities, and proximity to both the tranquil Playa del Cura (Blue Flag status) and the golden sands of La Mata just 6km away. The strategic location ensures easy access to essential services including the excellent Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja with 24-hour emergency care, while maintaining the peaceful residential atmosphere that makes Torrevieja such a desirable base for European residents seeking year-round sunshine.

propertyFeatures.intro: THE REFERENCE represents the highest standards of contemporary construction, combining Spanish building excellence with European design sensibilities. RIVESTURISMO has invested in premium materials and modern construction techniques throughout, ensuring durability, energy efficiency, and lasting value. Each apartment and penthouse is finished to exacting specifications with attention to detail evident in every room. Properties feature comprehensive pre-installation for air conditioning, high-performance double glazing with thermal breaks, and quality ceramic flooring selected for both aesthetics and practicality. The kitchens come fully equipped with modern appliances, while bathrooms showcase contemporary fixtures and finishes. Every residence benefits from strategic orientation and layout design maximizing natural light and ventilation.

content.investmentSection: THE REFERENCE offers compelling investment fundamentals in one of Spain's most dynamic property markets. Torrevieja's real estate market demonstrates consistent growth of +8% year-on-year, significantly outperforming broader Spanish averages. Properties in THE REFERENCE are positioned 45% below equivalent Costa Blanca North prices, offering exceptional value while maintaining strong appreciation potential. The rental market is particularly robust, with comparable properties generating €650 per week in tourist season, providing immediate income opportunities for investor-owners. Torrevieja attracts over 100,000 registered expatriates—the largest expat community in Spain—creating sustained demand for quality accommodation from holiday renters, relocating professionals, and retirees. The Centro location amplifies investment appeal through premium positioning and walkable access to premium amenities. Whether held for personal use with rental income potential or as a pure investment vehicle, THE REFERENCE combines affordability with strategic location in a market demonstrating sustained international appeal and favorable economic fundamentals.

Well-established neighborhoods like Centro offer family-friendly, secure environments.
